item.title: Alesis Nitro Mesh Electronic Drum Kit
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: Expressive playability. Dynamic sound. The Alesis Nitro Mesh electronic drum kit features responsive mesh pads and versatile sound options, making it ideal for practice or performance.
item.content:encoded:
Enter the world of electronic drumming with the Alesis Nitro Mesh Electronic Drum Kit. Designed for beginners and experienced players alike, this affordable kit offers realistic feel, responsive playability, and a wide range of sounds and features. The Nitro Mesh Kit features an 8-piece drum set with mesh drum heads, providing a natural feel and quiet operation that’s perfect for practice and performance. The included Nitro Drum Module offers 40 ready-to-play kits, 385 sounds, and 60 built-in play-along tracks, giving you plenty of options to explore and experiment with. With its intuitive interface, USB-MIDI connectivity, and headphone output for silent practice, the Alesis Nitro Mesh Electronic Drum Kit is the perfect solution for drummers looking to take their skills to the next level.

  • With 32 classic and modern drum kits from BFD + 16 user kits
  • 440 Drum, cymbal and precussion sounds
  • Reverb
  • 3-Band EQ
  • 60 Play-along-tracks
  • Sequencer, metronome and performance recorder
  • Large 10″ Dual-Zone mesh snare
  • 3x 8″ Mesh Single-Zone tom pads
  • 10″ Crash cymbal with choke
  • 10″ Ride and 10″ hi-hat with foot controller
  • 4-Post aluminium rack
  • Drum module with professionally recorded sounds from the BFD drum library
  • Bluetooth audio streaming for wireless music playback
  • Integrated device holder
  • USB/MIDI connection
  • 1/8″-Stereo-aux input
  • 1/4″ Stereo line outputs and 1/8″ headphone output
  • Includes 90-day free subscription to Drumeo and 30-day free subscription to Melodics Premium plus 60 exclusive lessons
